DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy AGN-214868 patient postherpetic neuralgia ( PHN ) - nerve pain .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Safety Efficacy AGN-214868 Patients With Postherpetic Neuralgia
DOC.criteria: Persistent postherpetic neuralgia ( PHN ) nerve pain present least 9 month onset herpes zoster skin rash Female patient reproductive potential Active herpes zoster skin rash Current anticipate treatment acupuncture , TNS , steroids Current anticipate use topical analgesic agent PHN Treatment botulinum toxin therapy serotype within prior 12 week
